props.name: onError
props.description: src或alt 地址请求出错回调

props.name: renderHoverMask
props.description: 自定义渲染 hover 时的遮罩层内容，options参数中有一个 preview 方法，调用 preview 方法可以预览图片

props.name: lazy
props.description: 是否延迟加载，如果为数字则表示懒加载偏移量

props.name: noImgDrag
props.description: 是否禁止 img 元素原生 draggable 属性

props.name: alt
props.description: 备用地址，src无效时会应用

props.name: autoSSL
props.description: 是否根据页面自动转换协议

examples.title: Base
Status
examples.description: Image has different status when loading

examples.title: *    -- Custom rendering of content in different states:
examples.description: 1. `error` is used to customize the content when loading fails

examples.title: Shape
examples.description: Image can be set to different shapes

examples.title: Fit
examples.description: Image has four different fill modes:

examples.title: Target
examples.description: Image has four open modes: _modal open preview through layer, _blank open preview through new window, _self open preview through current window, _download download image

examples.title: Group
examples.description: Image supports a group of images.

examples.title: *    -- Image supports tiled display of a group of images

examples.description: Image enables lazy loading mode by configuring the `lazy` property
